description:
GENERATIVE Persian Ancient Balouch Carpet (RARE EDITION)

Generative artwork exploring color and the emergent effect of stacking simple shapes and filling their intersections.which take you on the journey to an imaginary universe. All artworks are created using custom algorithms in processing.
This collection has an abstract look at Iranian carpets, Iranian art-industrial carpets that have long overshadowed Iranian culture as a name and credit for Iran.
the Baluch carpet is a wonderful example of true nomadic art. The Persian carpet, made in the Iranian-Afghan border region, is convincing thanks to its dense, asymmetrical knotting. Lively patterns make it a real feast for the eyes. Typical are rather dark shades that spread a pleasant warmth. Its beautiful natural yarn conveys quality and makes it extremely durable. Typical for this carpet is the straight-lined patterns that make it an unmistakable nomadic carpet.
